subject: Re: FROM THE JP MORGAN CHASE BANK
body:
*FROM THE JP MORGAN CHASE BANK*

*270 North Avenue New Rochelle*



*Attention: Mr  Robert*

*Good morning Mr Robert  received your email it was well noted, I am a
private legal representative , my job is to fight for the release of  long
overdue payment of $10.7 million dollars withhold by banks so that they can
get paid to the rightful beneficiary and that was why the bank directed you
to me to advise you further on how to claim your fund  . At this point I
think you should be glad that your unclaimed fund has finally been released
but you sound so unsure and scared which makes me worried . Questioning my
legitimacy is an insult to my office because I have done so much to bring
this transaction to the concluding stage but it seems all my effort is not
appreciated in any way.*


*You are not the only beneficiary I am dealing with. I have put a smile on
people's faces and  I will never stop until the bank stops defrauding
innocent people of their money . Please i would appreciate your
truthfulness if this fund does not belong to you because we have had cases
of contacting people with same name by mistake but if it is yours and you
are ready to proceed as the file i have on with me bears same name as yours
then i would be glad to help you till you get your fund only if your
cooperate and follow my instructions.*


*I have offices in NY, WA and CA ,we serve people all over the United
States and also overseas. The fund is ready and if you follow my directives
you would receive it in your account within 7 business days but if in any
case you feel you have been contacted wrongly kindly let me know so that we
can locate the real owner of this $10.7million *


*You are to provide the below information fir us to proceed further.*


*1) Your full name:*
*2) Phone, fax and mobile:*
*3) Address :*
*4) Profession:*
*5) Age:*
*6) Marital status:*
*7) Copy of your any valid ID card*

*Regards,*
*Todd Comb*

subject: Re: FROM THE JP MORGAN CHASE BANK
body:
*[image:
http://www.goodlogo.com/images/logos/jp_morgan_chase_logo_2723.gif]*
*FROM THE JP MORGAN CHASE BANK*
*270 North Avenue New Rochelle
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/270+North+Avenue+New+Rochelle?entry=gmail&source=g>*

*Attn: Dear Beneficiary*


*Good day, How are you doing today, sorry for getting back to you late as
we have been verifying some information here in our Department I have
received some information from a lady called Mrs Mary Stout claiming to be
your representative She order us to release your funds to her, i would like
to know if you have ask her to contact us regarding your funds, Kindly get
back to me asap before we proceed in releasing your funds to her, *


*Chase bank*
*Name:  Marry Stout*

*Routing Number: 021000021*
*Account Number: 553813802*
*Bank Address: 270 North Avenue New Rochelle*

*I hope to hear from you ASAP*


*Thanks.*
*Mr Todd Combs*
